item.title: Getting to know R: a very brief introduction
item.description: Getting to know R: a very brief introduction What is R? R is an open-sourced computer language that allows you to conduct data analysis and programming It is extremly versatile with 13002 packages that allow you to do pretty do anything, from spatial statistics to data wrangling to publication graphics. In fact, this document was written with R and Rstudio. A reason for its acceptance among researchers is its versatility.
